p: The word Dicoma is derived from two Greek words “ di” (two) and “ Kome” (tuft hair) and the word “ anomala” is of Latin origin means irregular. D. anomala is widely distributed in African countries such as South Africa, Angola, Burundi, Botswana, Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC), Rwanda, Tanzania, Zambia, and Zimbabwe [ 12]. D. anomala is mostly grow in grassy and savanna areas [ 13]. The genus Dicoma has more than 10 species ( Table 1).
